reviews.review_text: Basically it's 'Lemmings' game of old, but with sheep. Fun and frolics for many hours.
Lemmings but harder, cant wait for someone to Mod the actual lemmings into it

This game is a lot of fun to play; it's like Lemmings but with lots of gore!!  There is a lot of variety and the puzzles are fun to play.  Graphics are fantastic. My only criticism is that the mouse input feels extremely sluggish, it would be better if this game took advantage of hardware cursor input.

This game is about helping all the Sheep from being tortured, slaughtered, murdered.... by making them jump like Hulk, fly like Superman or make themselves build a ladder, a bridge or even suicide bomber like Chuck Norris ᕙ(｀皿´)╯ And about me, i'm enjoy watching them slaughtered by the killer machine :lol: - 10/10 best game to relieve stress and and one thing more to remember: No 'real' sheep were harmed during the making of this game.  Enjoy !!!

A decent enough game if you can get it cheap and enjoyed Lemmings. Strangely it seems to lack a lot of the charm of Lemmings despite being almost exactly the same game. I think the problem is the physics engine, it makes the game more about getting the timing bang on right rather than trying to solve a puzzle. This makes it very unforgiving and it's easy to lose all your sheep because you were half a second off the pace required for the level.  Unfortunately there is a massive problem with the controls for the game. Even with the mouse sensitivitly turned right down the game pans from one side of the map to the other in the blink of an eye and zoom seems to be all or nothing.
Can't recommend for technical reasons. No idea about gameplay apart from tutorial.     Reason #1 : Mouse accelleration.
Does not live up to Lemmings.
